title: What is phantom traffic and why is it ruining your life? - Benjamin Seibold

multiple-choice.question: What is a phantom traffic jam?

options.label: A
options.text: A traffic jam caused by a road accident

options.label: B
options.text: A traffic jam caused by a change in speed limit

options.label: C
options.text: A traffic jam whose behavior takes on a life of its own, greater than the sum of its parts

options.label: D
options.text: A traffic jam caused by a narrowing of the road

multiple-choice.question: What is the critical density of cars on the road for a phantom traffic jam to form?

options.label: A
options.text: Cars spaced more than 35 meters apart

options.label: B
options.text: Cars spaced less than 35 meters apart

multiple-choice.question: What type of feedback loop is responsible for dynamic instability in phantom traffic jams?
What is the effect of a driver braking too rapidly out of a slowdown?

options.label: A
options.text: It strengthens the wave of braking from vehicle to vehicle

options.label: B
options.text: It weakens the wave of braking from vehicle to vehicle

options.label: C
options.text: It has no effect on the wave of braking

options.label: D
options.text: It causes a chain reaction of braking

multiple-choice.question: What is the potential solution to phantom traffic jams according to the transcript?

options.label: B
options.text: Increasing the number of traffic lights

options.label: C
options.text: Installing self-driving cars equipped with data on traffic conditions ahead

multiple-choice.question: How many self-driving cars were needed in a recent experiment to dampen and prevent traffic waves?
What is the effect of dynamic instability on small disturbances in a system?

options.label: A
options.text: They are absorbed by other drivers' adjustments

multiple-choice.question: What is the reason why drivers tend to brake too hard to avoid a collision in a phantom traffic jam?

options.label: A
options.text: They don't have a good sense of the conditions ahead of them

options.label: B
options.text: They are trying to drive faster than the average flow of traffic downstream of them

options.label: C
options.text: They are trying to avoid a road accident

options.label: D
options.text: They are trying to avoid a change in speed limit

multiple-choice.question: What is the effect of a driver accelerating too rapidly out of a slowdown?

options.label: A
options.text: It strengthens the wave of braking from vehicle to vehicle

options.label: B
options.text: It weakens the wave of braking from vehicle to vehicle

options.label: C
options.text: It has no effect on the wave of braking

options.label: D
options.text: It causes a chain reaction of braking

multiple-choice.question: What is the potential benefit of new technology in reducing phantom traffic jams?

options.label: A
options.text: It will increase the number of traffic lights

options.label: C
options.text: It will render our roads safer, our daily commutes more efficient, and our air cleaner

options.label: D
options.text: It will have no effect on phantom traffic jams
